name: Free-Killing
description:
This was a demo I made as a school project and is therefore relatively barebones and unfinished. 

It is a class-based movement shooter, that is intended to be fast-paced and difficult.

While this project is not and will not be completed, I do work with 2 other people on a team called Trailblaze Studios where we will be releasing complete games.

Here's the linktree for those interested: https://linktr.ee/TRAILBLAZE.STUDIOS

Joining the discord is the best way to communicate about any issues with the game running or installing, as while I will not be updating or finishing the game, I still want my work to be playable for those interested as from play testing it can be fun.

Enjoy!
